<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#0A0A15" tools:context=".PembayaranActivity">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="#0A0A15" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_back" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:contentDescription="Back" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:gravity="center" android:text="Pembayaran" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="18sp" />
<View android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/btn_payment" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ll_header">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="16dp">
<!-- Movie Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#1A1A2E" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_movie_poster" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="90dp" android:contentDescription="Movie Poster" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/poster_spiderman" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_cinema_type" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="XXI" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_movie_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:maxLines="2" android:text="SPIDERMAN FAR FROM HOME" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_movie_rating" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:background="@drawable/rating_background" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:paddingStart="6dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingEnd="6dp" android:paddingBottom="2dp" android:text="SU" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_cinema_location" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="CSB XXI, STUDIO 1" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="11sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_movie_datetime" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Senin, 01 November 2025, 12:45" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="11sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Detail Transaksi Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_edit_text" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="Detail Transaksi" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Tickets Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="3 TIKET" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_seat_numbers" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="D2,D3,D4" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Seat Price Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="KURSI" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_seat_price_detail" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rp.60.000 x 3" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Service Fee Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="BIAYA LAYANAN" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_service_fee" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="2000 x 3" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Payment Method Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="Metode Pembayaran" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- DANA Option --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_payment_dana" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_edit_text" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:contentDescription="DANA" android:scaleType="fitStart" android:src="@drawable/logo_dana" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" />
<View android:id="@+id/radio_dana" android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/radio_button_unchecked" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- GoPay Option --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_payment_gopay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_edit_text" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:contentDescription="GoPay" android:scaleType="fitStart" android:src="@drawable/logo_gopay" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" />
<View android:id="@+id/radio_gopay" android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/radio_button_unchecked" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<!-- Payment Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_payment" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="SELESAIKAN PEMBAYARAN ANDA" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:backgroundTint="#7700FF" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
